entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cambridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:40 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 6:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -7.5°C
Wind: WNW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 40 gusting to 70 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets changing to periods of rain or drizzle near midnight and ending before morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of freezing rain in the evening. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 near midnight then west 40 gusting to 70. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
